characteristics.Description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
Add 2 to the bearer’s Toughness characteristic, but it no longer has the Firing Deck ability.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 22 ORKS INFANTRY models. If this model is equipped with a killkannon, it has a transport capacity of 12 ORKS INFANTRY models. Each MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK model takes up the space of 2 models. The GHAZGHKULL THRAKA model takes up the space of 15 models but can only embark within this model if this model is not equipped with an ’ard case, kannon, killkannon or zzap gun.

characteristics.Description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

This model can be attached to the following unit:
- BEAST SNAGGA BOYZ
Each time this model makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, melee weapons it is equipped with have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.
While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to Charge rolls made for that unit.
You can target this model's unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

This model can be attached to the following unit:
- SQUIGHOG BOYZ
While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.
While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase, you can return 1 destroyed Bodyguard model to that unit.

This model can be attached to the following unit:
- MEGANOBZ

Once per battle, at the end of your Movement phase, one model in the bearer’s unit regains D3 lost wounds.
Designer’s Note: Place a Grot Oiler token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used.

Unit.name: Big Mek with Kustom Force Field

characteristics.Description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks. Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can overcharge its kustom force field. If it does, until the end of the phase, this invulnerable save is improved to 4+.

This model can be attached to the following units:
- BOYZ
- BURNA BOYZ
- TANKBUSTAS
- LOOTAS
- NOBZ

Once per battle, the bearer can overcharge its kustom force field one additional time.
Designer’s Note: Place a Grot Helper token next to the bearer, removing it once this ability has been used.

Unit.name: Big Mek with Shokk Attack Gun

characteristics.Description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.
In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks; that unit must take a Battle-shock test.

This model can be attached to the following units:
- BOYZ
- LOOTAZ
- MEK GUNZ
- NOBZ

Once per battle, after rolling to determine how many attacks the bearer’s shokk attack gun makes, you can re-roll that dice.

**Designer’s Note:** *Place a Grot Assistant token next to the bearer, removing it once this ability has been used.*

Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this FORTIFICATION, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.
While a friendly ORKS unit is within 6" of this FORTIFICATION, improve the Leadership characteristic of models in that unit by 1.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 11 ORKS INFANTRY models (excluding GHAZGHKULL THRAKA). Each MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK model takes up the space of 2 models.

characteristics.Description: Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll one D6: on a 4+, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
While an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Benefit of Cover.

Once per battle, in your Movement phase, instead of making a Normal move with this model’s unit, you can remove it from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

This model can be attached to the following unit:
- KOMMANDOS
While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.
You can re-roll Charge rolls made for this model’s unit in a turn in which it was set up on the battlefield from Reserves.

This model can be attached to the following unit:
- STORMBOYZ

Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move. Until the end of the turn, models in that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover. In addition, roll one D6 for each model in that unit: for each 6, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
Each time this model makes a ranged attack, every successful Hit roll scores a Critical Hit.
At the start of the Fight phase, each enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more units with this ability must take a Battle-shock test.
While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.
Each time this model’s unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.

This model can be attached to the following unit:
- WARBIKERS
This model has a 4+ invulnerable save.
This model has a 2+ invulnerable save. You cannot re-roll invulnerable saving throws made for this model.

Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over enemy models (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLE models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.
Each time this model makes a melee attack, if the Waaagh! is active for your army, add 1 to the Hit roll.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ORKS INFANTRY models (excluding GHAZGHKULL THRAKA). Each MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK model takes up the space of 2 models.

characteristics.Description: For each model embarked within this TRANSPORT, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s butcha boyz weapon (to a maximum of +6).

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 21 BEAST SNAGGA INFANTRY models.

characteristics.Description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.
While an enemy INFANTRY unit is within 6" of this model, subtract 1 from the Toughness characteristic of models in that unit.

This model can be attached to the following unit:
- FLASH GITZ

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 11 BEAST SNAGGA INFANTRY models.

characteristics.Description: At the start of the Fight phase, you can select one friendly ORKS unit within 12" of this model and roll one D6: on a 1, this model suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2-5, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit; on a 6, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit and those weapons have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks made with a rivet kannon. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

Abilities.name: One Scalpel Short of a Medpack

characteristics.Description: While this model is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

This model can be attached to the following units:
- BOYZ
- BURNA BOYZ
- TANKBUSTAS
- LOOTAS
- NOBZ

Each time this model ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

This model can be attached to the following units:
- BOYZ
- LOOTAS
- MEK GUNZ
- NOBZ
- TANKBUSTAS
While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly ORKS VEHICLE units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

At the end of your Movement phase, you can select one friendly ORKS VEHICLE model within 3" of this model. That VEHICLE model regains up to D3 lost wounds, and, until the start of your next Movement phase, each time that VEHICLE model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn.

Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over enemy models (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLE models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.
Each time this model makes a ranged attack, if the Waaagh! is active for your army, add 1 to the Hit roll.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ORKS INFANTRY models (excluding GHAZGHKULL THRAKA). Each MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK model takes up the space of 2 models.

characteristics.Description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that attack. Each time this model makes an attack that targets a TITANIC unit, add 2 to the Damage characteristic of that attack instead.

While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if it has not fought this phase, roll on D6; on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

This model can be attached to the following unit:
- SQUIGHOG BOYZ

Once per battle, at the start of the battle round, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the start of the next battle round, this model’s unit gains the benefits of the Waaagh! ability as if you had called a Waaagh! this battle round.
While this model is gaining the benefits of the Waaagh! ability, it has a 4+ invulnerable save and an Objective Control characteristic of 5.

This model can be attached to the following units:
- BOYZ
- NOBZ
While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

At the end of your Movement phase, select one friendly BEAST SNAGGA CHARACTER model within 3" of this model. That model is healed and regains up to 3 lost wounds. Each model can only be healed once per turn

This model can be attached to the following unit:
- BEAST SNAGGA BOYZ

Once per battle, in your Command phase, if the bearer is leading a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can return up to D3 destroyed Bodyguard models to that unit.

This model can be attached to the following units:

- LOOTAS

- TANKBUSTAS

In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) hit by one or more of those attacks made with squig-launchas and roll one D6; on a 4+, until the end of your opponent's next turn, that enemy unit is hindered. While a unit is hindered, subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.

Once per battle, at the start of any phase, select one enemy unit within 3" of this model and roll one D6: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
Designer’s Note: Place a Squig Mine token next to the model, removing it once this ability has been used.

Each time this model is selected to Advance, you can remove it from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models instead of making an Advance move (this model is still considered to have Advanced this turn).
While this model has 1-10 wounds remaining, subtract 6 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
While a friendly ORKS unit is within 12" of this model, each time you take a Battle-shock test for that unit, add 1 to that test.
Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over models (excluding TITANIC models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

characteristics.Description: Once per battle, when the bearer’s unit is selected to shoot in your Shooting phase, the bearer can use its pulsa rokkit. If it does, until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer’s unit by 1.
At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ORKS INFANTRY models. Each MEGA ARMOUR model takes up the space of 2 models. It cannot transport JUMP PACK or GHAZGHKULL THRAKA models.

characteristics.Description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

- MEGANOBZ
Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that cannot FLY, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.
The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save, but it loses the **^^Grenades^^** keyword.

Once per turn, at the end of your Movement phase, one WEIRDBOY from your army can use this ability. If it does, roll one D6: on a 1, that WEIRDBOY’s unit suffers D6 mortal wounds; on a 2+, remove this WEIRDBOY’s unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

This model can be attached to the following unit:
- BOYZ

While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Strength and Damage characteristics of this model’s ’Eadbanger weapon for every 5 models in that unit (rounding down), but while that unit contains 10 or more models, that weapon has the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

In your opponent’s Command phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this PSYKER and roll one D6: on a 1, this PSYKER’s unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the start of your opponent’s next Command phase, that enemy unit is confrazzled. While a unit is confrazzled, each time a Battle-shock or Leadership test is taken for it, subtract 2 from that test.

This model can be attached to the following unit:
- BEAST SNAGGA BOYZ

While this model is leading a unit, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s Eyez of Mork weapon for every 5 models in that unit (rounding down), but while that unit contains 10 or more models, that weapon has the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

While this model is leading a unit:
- Models in that unit have the Scouts 9" ability.
- Each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.
- Each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
While the Waaagh! is active for your army, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this model’s unit.

This model can be attached to the following unit:
- GRETCHIN

Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this FORTIFICATION, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

When this FORTIFICATION is set up, all parts of it must be set up within 1” of another part. At the end of your Movement phase, each friendly ORKS VEHICLE model within 12” of this FORTIFICATION can regain up to D3 lost wounds (roll separately for each model). Each model can only be affected by this ability once per turn.
Each time an attack targets this model, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Each time this model is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if this model made a Charge move this turn: on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6+, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.
While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 10 ORKS INFANTRY models. If this model is equipped with a kannon, it has a transport capacity of 6 ORKS INFANTRY models. It cannot transport MEGA ARMOUR, JUMP PACK or GHAZGHKULL THRAKA models.

characteristics.Description: Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over models (excluding TITANIC models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.
This model does not suffer the penalty to its Hit rolls for making ranged attacks while enemy units are within Engagement Range of it.
While this model has 1-10 wounds remaining, subtract 6 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

GHAZGHKULL THRAKA takes up the space of 18 models. If this model is equipped with a supa-kannon, it has a transport capacity of 15 ORKS INFANTRY models.

characteristics.Description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit within half range, add 1 to the Hit roll.
While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ORKS INFANTRY models. Each MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK model takes up the space of 2 models. It cannot transport GHAZGHKULL THRAKA models.

characteristics.Description: Each time this model is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if this model made a Charge move this turn: on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6+, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.
If this model is equipped with 2 dread killsaws, those weapons have the [TWIN-LINKED] ability. If this model is equipped with 2 dread rippa klaws, those weapons have the [TWIN-LINKED] ability.

At the end of your Movement phase, you can select one friendly ORKS VEHICLE model within 3" of this model. That VEHICLE model regains up to D3 lost wounds, and, until the start of your next Movement phase, each time that VEHICLE model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn.
If this model is equipped with 2 dread killsaws, those weapons have the [TWIN-LINKED] ability. If this model is equipped with 2 dread rippa klaws, those weapons have the [TWIN-LINKED] ability.

Each time this model ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ORKS INFANTRY models. Each MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK model takes up the space of 2 models. This model cannot transport GHAZGHKULL THRAKA models.

Each time this model’s unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this model’s unit.

This model can be attached to the following units:
- WARBIKERS

After this model has finished making its attacks against that target unit this phase, each unit struck by a concussive wave this phase suffers D3 mortal wounds.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 6 ORKS INFANTRY models. Each MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK model takes up the space of 2 models. This model cannot transport GHAZGHKULL THRAKA models.

Abilities.name: Has Yoo Been a Good Little Grot This Year?

characteristics.Description: Once per battle, in your Shooting phase, you can target this model’s unit with the Grenade Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

This model can be attached to the following unit:
- GRETCHIN

This model can be attached to the following unit:
- WARBIKERS
While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.
In your Shooting phase, just after selecting a target for this model’s krusha kannon, the target unit and every other enemy INFANTRY unit within 3" of that unit must take a Battle-shock test.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ORKS INFANTRY models. Each MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK model takes up the space of 2 models. This model cannot transport GHAZGHKULL THRAKA models.

characteristics.Description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to an ORKS model from your army, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this DEFF ROLLA BATTLE FORTRESS model, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 22 ORKS INFANTRY models. Each MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK model takes up the space of 2 models. The Ghazghkull Thraka model takes up the space of 18 models.

characteristics.Description: If this model starts the game in Strategic Reserves, it can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules.
Once per battle, after the bearer ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved across during that move and roll six D6: for each 4+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ORKS INFANTRY models. This model cannot transport GHAZGHKULL THRAKA, MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK models.

characteristics.Description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that cannot FLY, add 1 to the Hit roll.
Each time the bearer ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved across during that move and roll three D6: for each 4+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that can FLY, add 1 to the Hit roll.
Each time the bearer ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved across during that move and roll three D6: for each 4+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

Abilities.name: Da Bigger Dey Are, da Better Dey Drop

characteristics.Description: Each time an attack made with this model’s lifta-droppa destroys an enemy model that has the Deadly Demise ability, that model’s Deadly Demise ability inflicts mortal wounds on a D6 roll of 3+ instead of on a 6.
Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that contains five or more models, you can re-roll the Hit roll.
While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

At the end of your Movement phase, you can select one friendly ORKS VEHICLE model within 3" of this model. That VEHICLE model regains up to D3 lost wounds, and, until the start of your next Movement phase, each time that VEHICLE model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn.

This model can be attached to the following unit:
- WARBIKERS

Each time this model ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, select one enemy unit within 3" of this model and roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. That enemy unit must then take a Battle-shock test.
While a GRETCHIN unit is within 6" of this model, that unit’s Thievin’ Scavengers ability is successful on D6 rolls of 2+, instead of rolls of 4+.
While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Deep Strike ability.
Each time this model makes an attack that targets a TITANIC unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

This model can be attached to the following units:
- BOYZ
- NOBZ
While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

You can re-roll Advance rolls made for this model's unit. In addition, each time this model's unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, models in that unit can move through models and terrain features. When doing so, they can move within Engagement Range of such models but cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them, and any Desperate Escape test is automatically passed.

This model can be attached to the following units:
- BOYZ
- LOOTAS
- MEK GUNZ
- NOBZ
